hero.title: Automated Crypto Trading
hero.subtitle: with AI Intelligence
hero.description: Trade Bitcoin, Ethereum and 100+ cryptocurrencies automatically across all major exchanges. EMA-based strategies, instant execution, 24/7 monitoring.

features.title: Everything You Need to Trade
features.subtitle: Professional-grade tools designed for both beginners and experienced traders
features.ema_desc: Advanced EMA crossover strategies with customizable parameters. Trade on 15-minute timeframes with precision.
features.exchange_desc: Connect to Binance, Bybit, OKX, KuCoin, and more. Trade spot and futures markets from one platform.
features.execution_desc: Lightning-fast order execution with automatic TP/SL management. Never miss a trading opportunity.
features.risk_desc: Built-in stop-loss and take-profit controls. Protect your capital with advanced risk management tools.
features.analytics_desc: Track performance with detailed P&L reports, win rates, and position monitoring in real-time.
features.security_desc: Your API keys are encrypted and stored securely. We never have access to your withdrawal permissions.

pricing.title: Simple and Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Change or cancel anytime.
pricing.guarantee: All plans come with a 14-day money-back guarantee. No credit card required for free plan.

dashboard.no_positions_desc: Start trading to see your positions here
dashboard.how_to_step1: Add your API key from Settings > Exchanges tab (Binance/Bybit/OKX).
dashboard.how_to_step2: Your subscription determines plan limits. Upgrade from Settings > Subscription if needed.
dashboard.how_to_step3: Select symbol on Trading page, enter trade parameters and open position.
dashboard.how_to_step4: Track your open positions and performance on Dashboard.

exchange.security_1: Never share your API keys with anyone
exchange.security_2: Only enable READ and TRADING permissions (NO withdrawals)
exchange.security_3: Your keys are encrypted with bank-level security
exchange.security_4: Enable IP restriction when creating API and add the following IPs
exchange.ip_whitelist_description: When creating your exchange API key, you must add these IP addresses to the whitelist for security:
exchange.ip_whitelist_instruction: Add these IPs in your exchange account: API settings > IP restriction section

footer.description: Automated crypto trading platform. Trade 24/7 with AI-powered strategies.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_content: At AI Trader, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you use our automated trading platform.
privacy.section2_content: We collect several types of information to provide and improve our services:
privacy.section2_item1: Account Information: Email address, name, and authentication credentials
privacy.section2_item2: Trading Data: Exchange API keys (encrypted), trading history, and performance metrics
privacy.section2_item3: Usage Data: Platform interaction patterns, feature usage, and technical diagnostics
privacy.section2_item4: Device Information: IP address, browser type, and device identifiers
privacy.section3_content: Your information is used to provide our trading services, improve platform functionality, ensure security, communicate updates, and comply with legal obligations. We never sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.section4_content: We implement bank-level encryption for all sensitive data, especially API keys. Your exchange credentials are encrypted using AES-256 encryption and stored securely. We use industry-standard SSL/TLS protocols for all data transmission.
privacy.section5_content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can export your trading data at any time. You may also request account deletion, which will permanently remove all your data from our systems.
privacy.section6_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@aitrader.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1_content: By accessing and using AI Trader's automated trading platform, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.section2_content: AI Trader provides an automated cryptocurrency trading platform that connects to various exchanges via API. Our service includes EMA-based trading strategies, automatic position management, and real-time analytics.
terms.section3_item1: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services
terms.section3_item2: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
terms.section3_item3: You must provide accurate and complete information
terms.section3_item4: You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations
terms.section4_content: Cryptocurrency trading involves substantial risk of loss. You acknowledge that trading with automated strategies does not guarantee profits. Past performance is not indicative of future results. You should only trade with funds you can afford to lose.
terms.section5_content: When connecting exchange accounts, you must: (1) Only grant READ and TRADE permissions, (2) Never enable withdrawal permissions, (3) Use IP whitelisting when available. AI Trader is not responsible for losses resulting from compromised API keys.
terms.section6_content: AI Trader shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from your use of the platform. This includes losses from trading decisions, technical failures, or unauthorized access.
terms.section7_content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our service at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes when possible.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AI Trader
faq.q1: How does the automated trading bot work?
faq.a1: Our bot monitors EMA 9 and EMA 21 crossovers in real-time. When a bullish crossover occurs (EMA 9 crosses above EMA 21), it opens a LONG position. When a bearish crossover occurs, it opens a SHORT position. The bot automatically manages TP/SL levels based on your settings.
faq.q2: Is my exchange API key safe?
faq.a2: Yes. Your API keys are encrypted using AES-256 encryption and stored securely. We only require READ and TRADE permissions - never withdrawal permissions. Additionally, we recommend using IP whitelisting for extra security.
faq.a3: We support major exchanges including Binance, Bybit, OKX, KuCoin, MEXC, and more. The number of exchanges you can connect depends on your subscription plan.
faq.a4: We offer three plans: Free (1 exchange, basic features), Pro ($25/month, unlimited exchanges, auto-trading), and Enterprise (custom pricing, dedicated support, custom strategies).
faq.q5: Can I customize the trading strategy?
faq.a5: Pro and Enterprise users can customize EMA periods, time intervals (15m, 30m, 1h, 4h, 1d), leverage, TP/SL percentages, and position sizes. Free users have access to default settings.
faq.q6: How do I stop the bot?
faq.a6: You can disable auto-trading at any time from Settings > Auto Trading. This will stop the bot from opening new positions, but existing positions will remain open until you close them manually or they hit TP/SL.
faq.q7: What happens if I reach my position limit?
faq.a7: The bot will not open new positions once you reach your plan's limit. Free plan allows 3 positions, Pro allows 10, and Enterprise allows unlimited positions. Upgrade your plan for higher limits.
faq.a8: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a full refund.
faq.contact_us: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please reach out to our support team.
